name: Numitor
description: Numitor Ecosystem is powered by its native Numitor ($NUMI) utility and governance token. $NUMI will be the preferred mode of value exchange within the ecosystem, and it can be used to pay for access to products and services that are part of the Numitor Network. Holding and staking $NUMI earns special privileges to token holders, which includes staking rewards, voting rights, discounted fees and more.
